channel.title: NPC glitch 24/7
channel.description:
Hello Im burntoath and I am a mod on deadly-pking (a 317 pking server) and for some reason after every kill kbd goes invisible and still attacks so mods are constatntly npc resetting it does this with almost every other npc kbd was just an example I was wondering if there was a way to make it so that they dont glitch it is pretty much the only flaw on the server..... and owner has like no free time since hes busy with other things for the server and he has a life soo I was wondering if one of you guys could help? :D
thanks, burntoath

item.title: NPC glitch 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Burntoath Burntoath
item.description:
@Burntoath wrote:

ye it happens for our jad too, so firecapes are considered rare hahaha and thanks
